Subject: The Inspector
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

    Megatron, as I said before, found what he was looking for within the 
computer files. The Aliens, better known as the Szhi'kuri, were telepathic 
beings and had helmets the they used to increase there telepathy. By useing 
this, Megatron could hopefully communicate with the Armada.
    "Ah, there it is. Tarantulas, bring it here and we can have this whole 
thing settled. Yes." He said pointing.
    The spider did as he was told and brought the helmet over to Megatron. 
Aracnia watched suspiciously standing next to darkmouse. "What are you doing?"
    "Getting rid of the Aliens. When I say, 'go', you type in that code. 
Alright?" Megatron said to Tarantulas.
    Megatron placed the helmet on, which was very tight, and told the 
tarantula to 'go'. Tarantulas did so, and a bright light came from the 
helmet. Megatrons eyes suddenly went blank, and his body limp.

    His mind raced through the vast psycic pain that would send him into the 
A.I. of the Armada.....and if he could, Megatron planned on taking the ship 
over and destroying the autobots one and for all.

    Apollo detected the sudden intruder and isolated Megatron in a small 
file. He suspected something like this would happen....and he could make it 
work to his favor.
    Apollo then scaned Megatrons mind and picked out a form that would 
communicate with the far inferior beings. Once the form was picked, Apollo 
returned to Megatron.
    "Why do you intrude here?" Apollo said to the ghostly form of Megatron.
    He roared back, "Im trying to save my troops for your magnificent vessle!"
    Apollo detected his lies, and for this Megatron would be punished as well 
as his troops. "You are rejected. Program Inspector will be launced for 
complete recoreding of the happenings at Bunker 5471."
    Before Megatron could respond, he was shot back into his frail body, that 
went into stasis. Apollo now had to send the Inspector, based on Megatrons 
mind, to investigate.
